channel.title: Game glitched help {317}
channel.description:
Hi i'm using a deltascape source. It has buttload of glitched i would like to fix. Here they are:
1. When players follow they don't stand directly behind the person they are following....It gets annoying.
2. Players can walk thrugh walls when attacking an npc through a wall or following a player through a wall. JAIL DOESNT WORK IF THEY CAN DO THIS!
3. When admin/mod/owner capes get dropped, they stay in the same position as they are when they're weilded.
4. Barrage doesn't work while youre using melee, you have to stop attacking with melee, walk away, and then cast barrage(or any magic).
5. NPCS ARE FREEKED UP! Only a few npcs actauly stand in one peice. The rest, when attack or when moved, turn a bunch stick moving around.
6. All my emotes are messed up. Some of them mess up or glitch the way your player looks, others make them and move weird. I WANT WORKING SKILLCAPE EMOTES!
7. When you spec with claws, you regularly have 2 specs, but when you spec with claws on my source, the spec bar goes down to 1/4 full. BUT IT STILL HAS SPEC LEFT!
8. When players logg out it says"(playername) has logged in" "(Somone please help me fix these, or atleast some of them. I can't bring my server up until they're fixed.PLEASE HELP!!!!:'([br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2009, 09:44:49 am[/size][hr]somone please help.....

item.title: Game glitched help {317}
item.dc:creator: @life_lover7 life lover7
item.description:
@life_lover7 wrote:

Hi i’m using a deltascape source. It has buttload of glitched i would like to fix. Here they are:

  1. When players follow they don’t stand directly behind the person they are following…It gets annoying.

  2. Players can walk thrugh walls when attacking an npc through a wall or following a player through a wall. JAIL DOESNT WORK IF THEY CAN DO THIS!

  3. When admin/mod/owner capes get dropped, they stay in the same position as they are when they’re weilded.

  4. Barrage doesn’t work while youre using melee, you have to stop attacking with melee, walk away, and then cast barrage(or any magic).

  5. NPCS ARE FREEKED UP! Only a few npcs actauly stand in one peice. The rest, when attack or when moved, turn a bunch stick moving around.

  6. All my emotes are messed up. Some of them mess up or glitch the way your player looks, others make them and move weird. I WANT WORKING SKILLCAPE EMOTES!

  7. When you spec with claws, you regularly have 2 specs, but when you spec with claws on my source, the spec bar goes down to 1/4 full. BUT IT STILL HAS SPEC LEFT!

  8. When players logg out it says"(playername) has logged in"
    "(Somone please help me fix these, or atleast some of them. I can’t bring my server up until they’re fixed.PLEASE HELP!!!:’([br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2009, 09:44:49 am[/size][hr]somone please help…
